name: Game chess 2 players
description:
Game chess on a round board for 2 players

A new game chess on a round board for 2 players. Test your logic, learn to play chess on a round board. A new board game in chess - for your leisure.

Rules of the game chess:

• The pawn goes 1 square ahead, beats obliquely;
• The horse walks as usual in chess;
• the elephant walks as usual in chess;
• the queen goes like an elephant and a king;
• The king walks by 1 cage in any direction.

The object of the game is to remove the enemy king.

This game develops logical thinking. The game is for the whole family.
